CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Percentage of charge efficiency
2. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
3. PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu): A specific type of polymer material, likely a conjugated polymer.
4. PC: Polycrystalline silicon
5. BM: Buffer material
6. PC 70 BM: A specific type of polymer solar cell using PC and BM as materials.
7. P3HT: Poly(3-hexylthiophene)
8. PCBM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene):PC60bm (60 mol% fullerene) blend.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are: PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu), PC, BM, PC 70 BM, P3HT, and PCBM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The highest PCE of PSCs based on PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) reached 2.71%, which was lower than the 4-5 % of P3HT:PCBM devices.

Material Name entities: PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu), P3HT, PCBM.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Photovoltaic efficiency or Power Conversion Efficiency
2. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
3. PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu): A specific type of polymer or material used in the solar cells
4. PC: Polycrystalline silicon
5. BM: Buffer material or layer
6. System: The entire setup or configuration of the solar cell components.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE: Photovoltaic efficiency or Power Conversion Efficiency
2. PCE of PSCs: Power Conversion Efficiency of Polymer Solar Cells
3. PC 70 BM: A specific type of polymer solar cell system with a Power Conversion Efficiency of 2.71%
4. P3HT: Poly(3-hexylthiophene) - a specific type of material used in solar cells
5. 4-5 %: Power Conversion Efficiency of P3HT : PCBM devices, which is higher than PC 70 BM system.

So, the relevant entities are: PCE, PCE of PSCs, PC 70 BM, P3HT, and 4-5 %.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |
| Power Conversion Efficiency of Polymer Solar Cells (PCE of PSCs) |
| Power Conversion Efficiency of PC 70 BM system (2.71%) |
| Power Conversion Efficiency of P3HT : PCBM devices (4-5%) |
| Polymer Solar Cells (PSCs) |
| PC 70 BM |
| P3HT |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Photovoltaic efficiency or percentage conversion efficiency
2. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
3. PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu): A specific type of polymer material or blend
4. PC 70 BM: A specific type of polymer or polymer blend in the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) system
5. 2.71%: The highest percentage conversion efficiency of the PC 70 BM system
6. 4-5%: The percentage conversion efficiency range of the P3HT : PCBM devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCE: Photovoltaic efficiency
2. 2.71%: The highest percentage conversion efficiency of the PC 70 BM system
3. 4-5%: The percentage conversion efficiency range of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 2.71% (highest PCE of PC 70 BM system) |
| 4-5% (percentage conversion efficiency range of P3HT : PCBM devices) |
